post_text:
DIA Celebration of Music

"Celebration of Music Extravaganza" concert from 2PM-3PM Saturday, March 18, 2017; Special guests will include the "World renowned Memphis Boys & Girls Choir" with a musical playlist that includes Motown, Stax & Gospel

The concert is free and suited for the entire family!!!

All of the events will take place at Lakewin Christian Center located across the street form the School. The address is 6449 Church Street.

post_text: Campus wide Open House Saturday, August 6, 2016, from 10AM until 2PM. This will give you an opportunity to visit your child’s classroom and gain a better understanding of our pick-up and drop-off procedures.

post_text:
Student & Family Orientation and Back to School Celebration Friday, August 5, 2016 at 6:30 PM.

Du Bois Integrity Academy will be the first and last K-5 Charter School to hold it’s Back to School event exclusively at the Georgia Dome! Doors will open at 6PM, and we will begin distributing information packets at that time. The event will start promptly at 6:30PM. We strongly encourage all students and their extended family to attend. (You will receive an email regarding parking)

Please have your Scholars dress in their uniform (Gray Shirt, Blue Pants or Skirt and Black Shoes) to the Dome event. We will be taking a school wide group photo of all students. Every DIA student that attends the Back to School Rally at the Georgia Dome will receive a free custom designed special edition DIA T-shirt and free school supplies! Students must be in attendance to receive this gift. NO Exceptions!!!

Students must be in attendance to receive this gift. NO Exceptions!!!

post_text:
Shoe Update for Boys & Girls

We have changed the Shoe & Accessory policy this year to include:

Any ALL BLACK shoe (sneaker or canvas all black to include all black soles). Please visit website for additional information www.duboisintegrityacademy.org

**Girls only - Mary Jane Shoe - Optional shoe - IF you purchase shoe, please wear on Weds. (Dress-up day); This shoe may be worn any day during the week; however, please consider daily recess activity. (Again, this shoe is optional - NOT MANDATORY)

post_text:
Hello DIA Kindergarten Parents;

I apologize for the confusion regarding the date for Kindergarten Graduation. We encountered some communication challenges with the Church regarding the availability of the Sanctuary. I take full responsibility for the confusion and inconvenience. At the end of the day, in an effort to accommodate the number of parents and students that we will have attending, we have no choice but to go with the date of June 1, 2016 based on the sanctuary availability.

The Ceremony will take place at New Macedonia Baptist Church located at 7725 Highway 85, Riverdale, Georgia 30274.

In order to start the program on time we ask that all Kindergarten students arrive between 6:00 PM and 6:30 PM. Please be mindful that the early arrival will allow us to get all of our students dressed in their cap & gowns and lined up for their march in which will start promptly at 6:45 PM.

post_text: DIA 5th Grade Graduation Ceremony: Our fifth grade ceremony will take place on Friday, June 3, 2016 at 10:00 AM at Lakewin Christian Center located at 6449 Church Street, Riverdale, GA 30274. Please drop off your child at their regular school time. We will assist them with getting dressed and escort them across the street to Lakewin Christian Center. We will start promptly at 10:00 AM. Our guest speaker will be Pastor Harry J. Riley of Lakewin Christian Center.

DIA Kindergarten Graduation Ceremony: As presented to you by your child's teacher, this is a reminder that our inaugural Kindergarten Ceremony will be held on Wednesday, June 1, 2016at 6:45 PM. The Ceremony will take place at New Macedonia Baptist Church located at 7725 Highway 85, Riverdale, Georgia 30274.

In order to start the program on time we ask that all Kindergarten students arrive between 6:00 PM and 6:30 PM. Please be mindful that the early arrival will allow us to get all of our students dressed in their cap & gowns and lined up for their march in which will start promptly at 6:45 PM.

post_text:
All 2nd Graders: We are pleased to invite your second grader and the rest of your family to attend the Riverdale City Hall "Mayor & Council Meeting" on Monday, May 23, 2016 at 7:00 PM. As part of our Social Studies curriculum, DIA second graders will have a chance to see our local City Government at work. We will also make a presentation and have our students perform by saying the school creed in both English and Spanish.

In order to get through City Hall Security and be on time, please arrive with your child no later than 6:45 PM. Riverdale City Hall is located at 7200 Church Street, Riverdale, Georgia 30274. Our student attire will be the Gray polo shirt, Khaki pants and black shoes.

post_text:
Our School policy is to mirror the Clayton County Public School closing and delayed opening announcements as it relates to weather related emergency events.

You can tune into your local TV and Radio media affiliates to hear these announcements.

Please be advised we will also post any school closings or delayed openings on our Website and Facebook page.

Student, Parent, Staff and Teacher safety will always be our objective in weather emergency related events. Should the need arise for additional action beyond the above policy we will always notify you as soon as possible.
